description:
Tips like this one can be learned from the bum that lives in the sewers.
Some knowlege is free, but most of it will cost ya.
name: Schooled

description: Blue Schooled books such as this one are hint books which were free.
name: Blue Schooled Books

description:
Mojo is needed to perform Bitch Skillz. Using skillz decreases your mojo, & various items 
at the Kum & Leave will repinish your Mojo meter.
name: MOJO

description:
You need mojo to use Bitch Skillz, but when used on people can gain you money, info,
or items. Each skill requires different amounts of mojo.
name: Bitch Skillz

description:
Unlike Urban Bitches 1, you can revisit each location. In fact, as you gain new items 
& abilities you'll be able to access new areas to find all the secrets.
name: Replay Value

description: Black Schooled books such as this one are hint books that reveal game secrets.
name: Black Schooled Books

description:
When starting the game walk onto the first level portal & then walk back to the 
starting point. Now press enter twice. This is a one time trick that will gain you $40.
name: Bonus $40

description:
Notice how each level portal is red? When each secret is found in that level, the 
portal turns green. Keep track of missing secrets in each chapter.
name: Level Portals

description:
You can get to the secret room in your house by playing the piano. You can do so
after you learn how to play the piano later in the game.
name: Secret Room

description: Yellow Schooled books such as this one are hint books which give suggestions.
name: Yellow Schooled Books

description:
Scratch offs, stolen debit cards, and gambling are your best bets for 
making fat stacks.
name: Earning Money

description:
If you're out of cash then go crash on your bed back home. A good 12 hour nap will put 
a little money in your pocket to get you back on your feet. Only works if you have $0.
name: Dead Ass Broke

description:
Some items that replinish Mojo and Swag can be carried with you at all times. This
way you can use the item in a level rather than having to go back to the Kum & Leave.
name: Carried Consumables

description:
You can use some of the number keys on the keyboard to quickly access special menues.
Press 1 for the SKillz Tree, 2 for the music player, and 3 for yoru photo album.
name: Shortcut Keys

description:
Once you hear a song in the game you can access it in your CD player.
The song can only be played on demand from the music player.
name: Music Player

description: The Skillz Tree displays your upgradable abilities and their current level.
name: Skillz Tree

description:
If any images are even stuck on screen, press the Zero key on the keyboard
to clear them out.
name: Clearing Images

description:
Be sure to reprogram the Key Card in the maintenance office to search all of the
rooms.
name: Motel 69

description:
A lot of areas can only be seen from another perspective.
If you get close enough to a hidden area, the camera angle will change.
name: Perspective

description:
If you're broke and take a nap to get more money, be sure to take a nap in the latest chapter.
Chapter 1 will give you $10, Chapter 2 $20, Chapter 3 $30, ect.
name: Napping

description:
The quickest way to take a nap is to eat a Tide Pod. Just be sure to eat it in
the latest chapter that you have unlocked.
name: Fast Napping

description:
Winnng beatdowns increases the strength of the Infinity Knuckles. Stronger knuckles
requires less energy to break shit, and breaks it quicker!
name: Beatdowns

description:
Now that you're over 30% through the game, you should probably know that
there's a game manual, and you can access it by pressing F1.
name: Help File

description:
Each chapter has a hidden area consisting of a haunted trap house.
Look for a rock blocking the path on the chapter hud, and use a hammer to clear the rock.
name: Trap Houses

description:
Finding all the collectables in a level will unlock a wallpaper that can be used in
the game menu. Press the 3 key to view the photo album.
name: Wallpapers

description:
When deciding between a Gold and Blue chest, money is more difficult to obtain
towards the begining of the game.
name: Choice Machines

description:
Sure, you could buy and read these books, reload your save, and not buy the books.
Buying these books is still required to 100% this level, and the game.
name: Being Cheap

description:
Remember, just because you can go to the next level doesn't mean that
you've experienced all there is to experience in that level.
name: Exploring

description:
To hit during a beatdown you can click the left mouse button, tap on the screen, or 
press the up arrow.
name: Beatdowns Vol. 2

description:
My middle name is Taylor, though you probably didn't know my first name either, 
Jacob.
name: What's in a name?

description:
You can get into Starbuds in the 2nd level of the 4th chapter by crossing the pond.
Starbuds will sell you an asset you wont want to leave behind.
name: Because I Got High

description:
Be sure to stop by Knittas. Just because you may have visted the one in Ch. 2 doesn't
mean you've seen everything Knittas has to offer.
name: Threads

description:
Leveling Up increases your Mojo and Swag. It may not play as much of a part now, but
you'll be thankful that you did later.
name: Leveling Up

description:
If you're in need of money fast, you can always buy multiple slushies, save your game,
then play multiple scratch-offs. If you lose, then re-load your save.
name: Grindin'
